articles.title: Webb telescope captures ‘Phantom Galaxy’ in dazzling detail - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: The James Webb space telescope has revealed dazzling new detail of a slice of the cosmos 32 million light-years away in a new picture released by NASA and the European Space Agency (ESA).
